instructors.instructor_addr: Catalysis Bldg, Rm 323, 2137 Tech Drive, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Mechanics of internal forces (stress)
Geometry of deformation (displacements & strains)
Material response (stress-strain relations)
Beams
Energy Methods: strain-energy, principle of minimum potential energy, Rayleigh-Ritz
Finite Element - Ansys
Rods, Beams on elastic foundations, Plates

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value:
Three 30 minute in-class quizzes (10 points each, 30 points in all)
Dynamic web lecture notes by professor
